Package external

Interface EntertainmentProviderSystem

All Known Implementing Classes:
MockEntertainmentProviderSystem
public interface EntertainmentProviderSystem
Interface for the external EntertainmentProviderSystem, it allows informing about changes made to events and bookings on our system, and querying for up-to-date number of available tickets for a given EventPerformance (in case ticket sales are made outside this system). Each EntertainmentProvider has their own EntertainmentProviderSystem and only relevant information for that provider is sent/queried by the application.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void cancelBooking​(long bookingNumber)
    Inform the EntertainmentProviderSystem that a Booking has been cancelled
    void cancelEvent​(long eventNumber, String message)
    Inform the EntertainmentProviderSystem that an Event was cancelled on this application.
    int getNumTicketsLeft​(long eventNumber, long performanceNumber)
    Query the EntertainmentProviderSystem for the latest number of available tickets for a given EventPerformance
    void recordNewBooking​(long eventNumber, long performanceNumber, long bookingNumber, String consumerName, String consumerEmail, int bookedTickets)
    Inform the EntertainmentProviderSystem that a new Booking was made by a Consumer for an EventPerformance of a TicketedEvent
    void recordNewEvent​(long eventNumber, String title, int numTickets)
    Inform the EntertainmentProviderSystem that a new Event was created on this application.
    void recordNewPerformance​(long eventNumber, long performanceNumber, LocalDateTime startDateTime, LocalDateTime endDateTime)
    Inform the EntertainmentProviderSystem that a new EventPerformance was added in this application
    void recordSponsorshipAcceptance​(long eventNumber, int sponsoredPricePercent)
    Inform the EntertainmentProviderSystem that a GovernmentRepresentative has approved a SponsorshipRequest for a TicketedEvent
    void recordSponsorshipRejection​(long eventNumber)
    Inform the EntertainmentProviderSystem that a GovernmentRepresentative has rejected a SponsorshipRequest for a TicketedEvent

  • Method Details

    • recordNewEvent

      void recordNewEvent​(long eventNumber, String title, int numTickets)
      Inform the EntertainmentProviderSystem that a new Event was created on this application.
      Parameters:
      eventNumber - unique event identifier corresponding to the newly created event
      title - title of the newly created event
      numTickets - number of tickets initially available in the newly created event

    • cancelEvent

      void cancelEvent​(long eventNumber, String message)
      Inform the EntertainmentProviderSystem that an Event was cancelled on this application.
      Parameters:
      eventNumber - unique identifier corresponding to the cancelled Event
      message - a message from the organiser to all the Consumers who had Bookings for any EventPerformances of this event

    • recordNewPerformance

      void recordNewPerformance​(long eventNumber, long performanceNumber, LocalDateTime startDateTime, LocalDateTime endDateTime)
      Inform the EntertainmentProviderSystem that a new EventPerformance was added in this application
      Parameters:
      eventNumber - unique event identifier corresponding to the event to which the performance was added
      performanceNumber - unique performance identifier corresponding to the newly added performance
      startDateTime - date and time when the performance is due to start
      endDateTime - date and time when the performance is due to end

    • getNumTicketsLeft

      int getNumTicketsLeft​(long eventNumber, long performanceNumber)
      Query the EntertainmentProviderSystem for the latest number of available tickets for a given EventPerformance
      Parameters:
      eventNumber - unique event identifier corresponding to the event to query
      performanceNumber - unique performance identifier corresponding to the event performance to query
      Returns:
      number of available tickets

    • recordNewBooking

      void recordNewBooking​(long eventNumber, long performanceNumber, long bookingNumber, String consumerName, String consumerEmail, int bookedTickets)
      Inform the EntertainmentProviderSystem that a new Booking was made by a Consumer for an EventPerformance of a TicketedEvent
      Parameters:
      eventNumber - unique event identifier corresponding to the event the booking was made for
      performanceNumber - unique performance identifier corresponding to the performance the booking was made for
      bookingNumber - unique booking identifier corresponding to the new booking
      consumerName - full name of the consumer who made the booking
      consumerEmail - email address of the consumer who made the booking
      bookedTickets - number of booked tickets

    • cancelBooking

      void cancelBooking​(long bookingNumber)
      Inform the EntertainmentProviderSystem that a Booking has been cancelled
      Parameters:
      bookingNumber - unique booking identifier corresponding to the cancelled booking

    • recordSponsorshipAcceptance

      void recordSponsorshipAcceptance​(long eventNumber, int sponsoredPricePercent)
      Inform the EntertainmentProviderSystem that a GovernmentRepresentative has approved a SponsorshipRequest for a TicketedEvent
      Parameters:
      eventNumber - unique event identifier corresponding to the event that was sponsored
      sponsoredPricePercent - sponsorship amount in % of the maximum number of tickets * ticket price

    • recordSponsorshipRejection

      void recordSponsorshipRejection​(long eventNumber)
      Inform the EntertainmentProviderSystem that a GovernmentRepresentative has rejected a SponsorshipRequest for a TicketedEvent
      Parameters:
      eventNumber - unique event identifier corresponding to the event that was not sponsored
